com.github.curriculeon.greeps

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • com.github.curriculeon.greeps.Creature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Greep

    public abstract class Creature
extends greenfoot.Actor
    A Creature is the base class for all alien beings in this scenario. It provides the basic abilities of creatures in this world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Creature(Spaceship ship)
      Create a creature at its ship.

        string-representation of the current image of this `Creature` instance

        public final void setImage(java.lang.String imageName)
        Overrides:
        setImage in class greenfoot.Actor
        Parameters:
        imageName - path of image to set this `Creature` instance to

      • act

        public final void act()
        Act - must be called as part of subclass act. This ensures single movement in each act round.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • move

        public final void move(int amount)
        To avoid confusion/cheating, calling the built-in Greenfoot move(int amount) does the same as the Creature move() function.
        Overrides:
        move in class greenfoot.Actor

      • turnTowards

        Parameters:

                        float likelihoodOfTurn)
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to turn towards
        likelihoodOfTurn - the likelihood of successfully turning toward the specified actor

        turn towards the ship

        public void turnTowardsHome(float likelihoodOfTurn)
        turn towards the ship with some likelihood
        Parameters:
        likelihoodOfTurn - the likelihood of successfully turning toward the ship

      • turnOppositeDirection

        public void turnOppositeDirection(int angle)
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle to turn away from

                         int likelihoodOfExecutingTurn)
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to turn away from
        likelihoodOfExecutingTurn - the likelihood of executing the turn

      • isAtShip

        public final boolean isAtShip()
        Returns:
        true if we are at our space ship.

      • isAtTomatoes

        public final boolean isAtTomatoes()
        Returns:
        true if we have found food at our current location.

      • getSurroundingTomatoPile

        public TomatoPile getSurroundingTomatoPile()
        Returns:
        the instance of the tomato pile that this `Creature` instance is currently intersecting; return null if no tomato pile can be found

      • isAtWater

        public final boolean isAtWater()
        Returns:
        true if we have just seen water in front of us.

      • isAtWorldEdge

        public boolean isAtWorldEdge()
        Returns:
        true if we are within 3 cells of the world's edge

      • isSeeingPaint

        public boolean isSeeingPaint(java.lang.String color)
        Check whether we can see paint of a given color where we are sitting.

      • isFlaggedForState

        public boolean isFlaggedForState(int state)
        Retrieve the value of a flag. 'flagNo' can be 1 or 2.

      • isCarryingTomato

        public final boolean isCarryingTomato()
        Check whether we are carrying a tomato.

      • removeTomato

        public final boolean removeTomato()
        Remove the tomato currently carried (and return true). Return false if we were not carrying one.

      • dropTomato

        protected final void dropTomato()
        Drop the tomato we are carrying. If we are at the ship, it is counted. If not, it's just gone...

      • loadTomato

        public final void loadTomato()
        Load a tomato onto *another* creature. This works only if there is another creature and a tomato pile present, otherwise this method does nothing.

      • spit

        public void spit(java.lang.String color)
        Spit a drop of paint onto the ground. We can spit in three colors: "red", "orange", and "purple". (All other strings will be mapped to one of these.)

      • setMemory

        public void setMemory(int val)
        Store a user defined value. Attention: even though the parameter type is int, only byte size values (0 <= val <= 255) are accepted.

      • getMemory

        public int getMemory()
        Retrieve a previously stored value.

      • setFlag

        public void setFlag(int flagNo,
                    boolean val)
        Store a user defined boolean value (a "flag"). Two flags are available, i.e. 'flagNo' may be 1 or 2.

      • getShip

        public Spaceship getShip()
        Returns:
        the Spaceship to return tomato piles to

      • move

        public void move()
        Move forward roughly in the current direction. Sometimes we get a little off course.

      • canMove

        public java.lang.Boolean canMove()
        Returns:
        true if the next coordinate is not equal to the current coordinate

      • getNextXCoordinate

        public int getNextXCoordinate()
        Returns:
        return the `Y` coordinates of the next location to move into

      • getNextYCoordinate

        public int getNextYCoordinate()
        Returns:
        return the `X` coordinates of the next location to move into
